mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, U.*, R.RID, R.NAME FROM TB_USER U, TB_USER_ROLE UR, TB_ROLE R WHERE U.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND R.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND U.ID = UR.USER_ID AND UR.ROLE_ID = R.RID AND U.USERNAME LIKE '%' || #{username} || '%' AND ROWNUM <= (#{page} + 1) * #{size}) WHERE RN > #{page} * #{size}
SELECT count(*) FROM TB_USER U, TB_USER_ROLE UR, TB_ROLE R WHERE U.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND R.DELETE_YN = 'N' AND U.ID = UR.USER_ID AND UR.ROLE_ID = R.RID AND U.USERNAME LIKE '%' || #{username} || '%'
